Package com.amazonaws.kinesisvideo.parser.utilities

Class DynamoDBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.kinesisvideo.parser.utilities.DynamoDBHelper
  • public class DynamoDBHelper
extends Object
    DynamoDB helper class to access FragmentCheckpoint table. Used by the KinesisVideoRekognitionLambdaExample to save fragment checkpoints between successive lambda executions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DynamoDBHelper​(com.amazonaws.regions.Regions region, com.amazonaws.auth.AWSCredentialsProvider credentialsProvider)

    • Method Detail

      • createTableIfDoesntExist

        public void createTableIfDoesntExist()
        Creates the FragmentCheckpoint table if it doesn't exist already.

      • getItem

        public Map<String,​com.amazonaws.services.dynamodbv2.model.AttributeValue> getItem​(String streamName)
        Gets the FragmentCheckpoint item from the table for the specified stream name.
        Parameters:
        streamName - Input stream name
        Returns:
        FragmentCheckpoint entry. null if any exception is thrown.

      • putItem

        public void putItem​(String streamName,
                    String fragmentNumber,
                    Long producerTime,
                    Long serverTime,
                    Long updatedTime)
        Put item into FragmentCheckpoint table for the given input parameters
        Parameters:
        streamName - KVS Stream name
        fragmentNumber - Last processed fragment's fragment number
        producerTime - Last processed fragment's producer time
        serverTime - Last processed fragment's server time
        updatedTime - Time when the entry is going to be updated.

      • updateItem

        public void updateItem​(String streamName,
                       String fragmentNumber,
                       Long producerTime,
                       Long serverTime,
                       Long updatedTime)
        Update item into FragmentCheckpoint table for the given input parameters
        Parameters:
        streamName - KVS Stream name
        fragmentNumber - Last processed fragment's fragment number
        producerTime - Last processed fragment's producer time
        serverTime - Last processed fragment's server time
        updatedTime - Time when the entry is going to be updated.
